HEADLINE:
Reg : Conference Call Invitation.

This is to inform you that the Company is organizing a Conference Call on Thursday, 01st November, 2018 at 16:00 hrs IST, hosted by Prabhudas Lilladher to discuss the Company's Q2 FY19 financial Results, subsequent to its Board Meeting to be held on 31st October, 2018. (Invitee Attached).

Reg : Conference Call Invitation.

This is to inform you that the Company is organizing a Conference Call on Wednesday, 08th August, 2018 at 15:00 hrs IST, hosted by Prabhudas Lilladher to discuss the Company's Q1FY19 financial Results, subsequent to its Board Meeting to be held on 07th August, 2018. (Invitee Attached).

Kindly take the information on record and inform the members accordingly.
